content.rendered:
THE NEW MODERN LOGO TREND

I’m back with a double favorite featuring my new beautiful black candles that are now available to purchase online! Moving on to fashion…2019 and 2020 is all about the logo. Not the ’90s logo trend but a new and improved modern single logo and step and repeat logo trend. I’m loving all the Fendi designs especially their logo bags that always go out of stock so quickly you need to be fast when they add new inventory.

All looks are from the most amazing website for all your fashion needs FWRD.COM. Did I mention they also have the coolest men’s shop as well? There are so many unisex items available to get from their men’s department from cool t-shirts to must-have sneakers.

Also, I’m super excited to announce that I will have a new innovative sleeping mask that will soon be available to purchase online. The D’Lashes eye mask is perfect to use while you’re sleeping and while you’re traveling to protect you D’Lashes lash extensions. I will announce it as soon as I have it up online!

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only).  Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. New beauty products just added!  

XO XO, DIONNE
